snippet: Senator Lindsey Graham said he would hold up administration nominations until survivors of the Benghazi attack were made available to Congress, despite the retraction of a news report that provoked Republicans’ renewed demands.
abstract: Senator Lindsey Graham said he would hold up administration nominations until survivors of the Benghazi attack were made available to Congress, despite the retraction of a news report that provoked Republicans’ renewed demands.

headline.main: Graham Sticks With Threat to Block Nominees
